heading_description: Hello! I'm a passionate developer with a love for creating beautiful, functional applications, solve problem for business. My journey into coding began out of curiosity for how digital experiences are crafted. I aspire to be Full-stack Developer and UX/UI Designer. I'm particularly interested in user experience design , performance optimization, and simplicity. Outside of coding, I love to play video games and make music.

project.description: Welcome to my hobby project collection. This is a curated showcase of my personal programming endeavors, developed to explore new technologies and implement interesting concepts. Each project represents an opportunity for technical growth and creative problem-solving in my spare time.

blog.description: Look at my main articles! I write about web design and development, music, games, and book stories. I also write about psychology and self-improvement. For the last 1 years, I have been looking at the amazing digital world. Join me on my trip to keep learning and making new things. Find out what is new in these cool areas!

contact.heading: Contact
contact.description: If you need help with a website or an application, don't hesitate to contact me
